text: Creme Puff (August 3, 1967 â€“ August 10, 2005) was a female cat from the United States. She was 38 years old at the time of her death, making her the oldest cat in the world at the time. She was the oldest cat ever recorded, according to the 2010 edition of Guinness World Records. ==Other websites== * "South Paws," a documentary about Jake Perry and his cats == References == Category:1967 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Individual cats
title: Creme Puff
